comment.author: 78372713@N00
comment._content: I'm sure I know this person.  She's a lens polisher, which I was for 6 months before I went to college.  We had to polish 560 lenses a day.  It was a horrible place to work.  The lens polishers didn't wear masks like the gluers did, even though we were in the same room with the glue.
